Add Point Marks

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Misc - Point Mark - Add Point Marks
Shortcut: P, K
Commands: pointmark

Description:

With this tool, you can mark position in a drawing with a symbol and a text label. These positions can be later exported in CSV format.

Procedure:

  1. Enter the desired text label for the benchmark in the options tool bar.
  2. Specify the position of the benchmark in the drawing. All coordinates of points added after this will relate to this benchmark.
  3. Enter the desired text label for the point marks in the options tool bar.
  4. Use the mouse to specify the location of the point or enter a coordinate in the command line.
